name: FIGHTING EX LAYER
description: After a long wait, Arika's EX characters gather once again for another exciting battle! Kairi, Skullomania, Blaire, Pullum and the others are all back with the latest graphics. And this time they're bringing a brand new system - the "Gougi System". Grasp victory with Gougi!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required) Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 @ 3.60GHz or equivalent Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 2GB, GTX 750Ti 2GB, or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required) Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 @ 3.50 GHz or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 equivalent or higher DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
